summary: The 'Train More Nurses Act' (H.R. 5052) mandates the Secretaries of Health and Human Services and Labor to review grant programs supporting the nursing workforce. A joint report to Congress, due within a year of enactment, must include recommendations to improve these programs. The bill focuses on increasing nurse faculty, particularly in underserved areas, creating pathways for experienced nurses to become faculty, and encouraging more licensed practical nurses to become registered nurses.
